abstract: BlackRock said that its third-quarter profit fell 3 percent, to $521 million, as the world's largest asset manager battled a volatile stock market and an anemic economic recovery.
snippet: BlackRock said that its third-quarter profit fell 3 percent, to $521 million, as the world's largest asset manager battled a volatile stock market and an anemic economic recovery.

headline.main: Market Volatility Hurts Profit at BlackRock
headline.print_headline: Volatility In Markets Hurts Results At BlackRock
